title: 감염병 대응인력 대상 설문조사를 통한 역학조사교육의 개편방향 건양대학교 의과대학 예방의학교실, 동국대학교 의과대학 예방의학교실 * The Direction of Restructuring of Korea Field Epidemiology Training Program through Questionnaire Survey among Communicable Disease Response Staff in Korea Division of Public Health Preparedness and Response, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Republic of Korea ** Running Title : Restructuring of a Korea Field Epidemiology Training Program
